properties.entry: Grapher3.2 removed need writing := before overriding constants added 'goto' constant removed last bug with recursion
Grapher3.3 added lambda expressions optimized calculating Implicit added version log file added usable arrays fixed bug with log file
Grapher3.4 fixed bug with function parameter lambda added color chooser for graphics changed default graphics colors
Grapher3.5 fixed bug with nullable parameters added opportunity of using external vars in lambdas fixed bug with 'max' function added hot keys for functions area
Grapher3.6 added more hot keys fixed bugs with russian language errors 'for' cycle returns sum
Grapher3.7 'arr' func returns length of array if idx is -1 calculator lambda described added random function added function 'update_graphic'
Grapher3.8 fixed one bug with external vars in lambda added painting last dot in translation added function 'finish' added function 'assert'

Grapher3.9 fixed bug with unsorted log added main_settings in saves added opportunity not to draw coordinates saves now contain central point of view (not left up) added functions for mouse: isMousePressed, getMouseX, getMouseY and parameter view_movable
Grapher4.0 fixed bug with calculator size state added function of painting graphic on paper by mouse
Grapher4.1 refactored error messages added some more parameters in settings.xml (open Grapher.jar like zip archive)
Grapher4.2 removed resize_idx from saves mouse wheel can't move view, while view_movable = 0 edited view of help changed '~' to '-' (for coordinates don't shown)
Grapher4.3 now 'hypot' from many arguments fixed bug with 'set' func fixed stopping app because of small net width
